channel.title: Physics on Live Kaizen life
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Live Kaizen life

item.title: QAM Modulation Technique Concept Challenges and Solutions
item.description: The new 802.11ac standard from IEEE, is currently penetrating wireless network markets with its new features and technology. Watson (2013), Public Marketing of Meru Networks, claims the 802.11ac standard will be able to provide a maximum client data rate per radio of 1.3 Gbps. How does it manage to achieve those higher bandwidths compared to the last standard? One part of this technology that makes it possible is the complex modulation technique that 802.

item.title: My First Stargazing Report
item.description: Well, actually I stargazed before, but I didn’t do that to really observe stars and constellations. This time was my first time stargazing as a beginner in Astronomy (learning Astronomy is part of my new year resolutions). It was Monday Night, January the 6th of 2014. I started to stargaze around EST 9.00 pm until 10.00 pm. It was cold in Syracuse since the temperature was -12 degree of Celsius, and the wind, that made the weather colder, blew with the speed of 50 kph.

item.title: Tachymeter
item.description: watch with tachymeter Beberapa bulan yang lalu saya beli arloji baru (maklum sudah jadi kebutuhan). Bentuknya hampir mirip sama gambar diatas. Setelah dibeli, saya teliti (Emang waktu mau beli ndak di teliti?), ternyata di arloji ada tulisan tachymeter. ini apaan sih? lalu arti dari angka-angka 300, 240, 200 s/d 60 itu apa? Setelah menggali informasi dari google, akhirnya saya mendapatkan kesimpulan bahwa mostly tachymeter digunakan sebagai alat bantu untuk memperkirakan kecepatan.
